approve().details: The caller must be a party in the settlement's flows

returns.success: True if the approval was successful

constructor.details: Sets up the contract with admin role and initializes meta-transaction support

params.forwarder: The address of the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions
params.settlementAutoExecute: Whether to auto-execute after all approvals
params.settlementCutoffDate: Timestamp after which the settlement expires
params.settlementFlows: The array of token flows to include in the settlement

returns._0: success True if execution was successful
approved True if all parties have approved

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

revokeApproval().details: The caller must have previously approved the settlement

returns._0: success True if the revocation was successful

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

approve().notice: Approves a XvP settlement for execution

execute().notice: Executes the flows if all approvals are in place

isFullyApproved().notice: Checks if all parties have approved the settlement

revokeApproval().notice: Revokes approval for a XvP settlement
